title: cultural_data_National_Rail_Museum_New_Delhi
text:
ï»¿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kc.railmuseumcompanion.autodetect.
Application Name: National Rail Museum New Delhi.
Number of Reviews: 7.00.
Application Description: We are pleased to launch this official App for the National Railway Museum, New Dehli. This App will serve as an ideal Companion for the Visitors. This App automatically detects the visitors location inside the museum ( This feature is only available to Android Phone OS version Jelly Bean 4.3 and above with BlueTooth v4.0 ), and presents him with appropriate multimedia information about the exhibit in context. The App gives the visitor benefits of...                 Auto Detection of the Visitors entry near the exhibit in context and present him appropriate information          Finding his location on the Museum Map         Serving as Audio Guide to certain exhibits         Interactive Multi Level maps         Learn More links to get additional information about the exhibits         Getting Special Offers from the Souvenir Shop directly to his mobile         Writing comments/ blogs about the exhibits visited         Sharing information on the Social Media         Participating in the contextual Quiz         Alerts the visitors about Tress passing into No Go areas         Loads of other information on his fingertipsRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 1149.00.
Overall Rate: 2.30.
First Page Reviews: Pathetic app....it says User Registration is optional...but wouldn't continue after the first page itself....hangs very bad, wastage of time . app not working. Not working shows server connection error message Highly recommended Great app! Has lot of information about the exhibits at the Railway Museum, easy to navigate and layout is very well organised..
